website_summaries.verdict: Airy, light, and responsive are some of the top-selling attributes of the New Balance FuelCell 996 v4. By utilizing the Hypoknit cover, the shoe turns out to be lighter and quicker than the previous models. Apart from these, the FuelCell midsole gives users the benefit of experiencing improved cushioning and low-to-the-ground stance for better maneuverability on any court surface.
pros: Scores of users are stirred by the stability of the New Balance FuelCell 996 ver 4
With the FuelCell midsole, many wearers feel that the shoe has more rebound and cushioning than the previous model
Most of the reviewers affirm that it’s comfortable right out of the box
Lots of playtesters appreciate how incredibly light this trainer is on foot
Quite a lot declare that the Hypoknit upper offers an airy feel even during long hours of play
Plenty are contented with the excellent level of traction this cushioned tennis shoe offers
cons: Some buyers notice that the upper isn’t as flexible as the nylon-infused knit on the past version
A couple of wearers find it to be narrow

customer_reviews.title: Great Hardcourt shoe so far
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome so far. I have Morton's neuroma in my foot so I'm always looking for a shoe with a wider toe box and cushion. I have played with these twice on hard court and I have had no toe jam and there is plenty of cushion. I tried the B width as well but those were a little too snug. The wide which felt really roomy but in the end worked great on court. There is no break in period. I am a 5.0 player and i'm rough on my shoes so we will see how well these hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy P

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my last pair of court shoes for pickleball. This time around I'm spending more because these are to be good for my planter fasciitis. They feel comfortable just walking around the house! Can't wait to use them on the courts in the morning! They may be worth the extra $$. (I can live with just about any color if they fit right :) )
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: No arch support
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great shoe, unless you have high arches. There is NO arch support and they are sooo flat. They are light, and breathable and great in every other way. But even with arch supports i had to send these back. Definitely more cushion in heel and leaves arches and front foot feeling beat up.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Was pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Very happy to see there was no start up time for them - felt great on Pickleball court right away- real good looking - I always buy a half size up for NB and I buy a wide fur the toe box - they fit wonderful! Although it is much pricier than what I buy for sneaks - I’m not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: happyfeet

customer_reviews.title: Great for tennis and pickleball!
customer_reviews.text: Love the comfort of these shoes. Nice to actually feel comfortable in a pair of court shoes.
customer_reviews.author: GrammieSuess

customer_reviews.title: No Bunion Pain
customer_reviews.text: I play tennis and this shoe is easy on my bunion and the knit material gives. I can play without any bunion pain. it is a wider shoe I ordered a 9B and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Joy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fit
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always worn size 7. They were very narrow at the heal so I returned for a 7 1/2 wide and they were still an awful fit!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Runs short
customer_reviews.text: Did run short. I will order half size bigger and see how those fit. Otherwise I think I will like them
customer_reviews.author: Lcc

customer_reviews.title: Loose after a while
customer_reviews.text: First It fits as expected. After a while it became loose around toe. I should order .05 smaller size
customer_reviews.author: Bicky

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe - I found they ran big.
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about the shoe - felt that ran large. Ordered my usual 6.5 and I will size down to 6! But cute, comfortable and stylish!
customer_reviews.author: MamaJo

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit well.
customer_reviews.text: They didn't fit well which surprised me because I have worn New Balance for years.
customer_reviews.author: schneidewind

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are just as advertised and were exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: TracieT

customer_reviews.title: Good value and so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is true to size, lightweight and very comfortable....good value! I wear 8.5 and 9 was just right as I go up half size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best version yet
customer_reviews.text: This version is the Best fitting tennis shoe I have ever worn. Comfortable right out of the box, much lighter than previous version.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfortable but the laces are too short
customer_reviews.author: Sally Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this shoe. Very light and breathable. Super comfortable and the color is great.
customer_reviews.author: Elyce Nissinoff

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT  a Wide Width despite the claim
customer_reviews.text: I sometimes take a 6 medium width, sometimes a 6 wide, depending on the shoe. I've had New Balance before and no issues. However this court shoe in a size 6 was ridiculously narrow, I couldn't even get my foot into the shoe with the laces wide open. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppin Poppins

customer_reviews.title: Wide footbed
customer_reviews.text: I have a really hard time finding shoes that are comfortable. These are great and I bought them for Pickleball because of the tread on the bottom. They have a wide footbed so plenty of room and are comfortable. Love the color too!
customer_reviews.author: B. Cathey

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I find that a lot of tennis shoes are too tight, so I like that these shoes fit my feet. They provide great balance and grip.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Scott

customer_reviews.title: New Balance made outside US
customer_reviews.text: I bought New Balance because they offer wide widths and I thought they were made in the US. My shoes were made in Indonesia. I was disappointed to learn this
customer_reviews.author: Kim S

customer_reviews.title: A great durable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love New Balance. Totally fits my foot & lifestyle (active). I use my own insole inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a nice shoe but was 0.5-1 size larger than my usual shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: K.K.

customer_reviews.title: Good for orthotics
customer_reviews.text: I tried over a dozen styles before finding these NB 996v4 court shoes. Have played a few weeks with my new orthotics in them and am very happy. They run true to size & width. Although snug in the forefoot, with a standard light sport sock they were very comfortable and lightweight. Heel slipped slightly until I "lock-laced" them at the top. Great lateral support, no break-in time. Many of the newest tennis styles of Nike, Asics, and NB fit the forefoot like a glove, very snug, so finding a pair with a deep enough toe box that is fabric (not leather) and will take an orthotic was a big challenge. Foot doc ok'd this shoe for this overpronator.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Arcadian

product_meta.title: New Balance Women's 996v4 Hard Court Tennis Shoe
product_meta.description: This Fuel Cell 996v4 tennis shoe from New Balance is designed with a synthetic mesh and hypo nit upper over a new and improved Full-length Fuel Cell midsole provides our most pinnacle propulsion and energy return. Underfoot, a full-length Endurance non-marking outsole gives you the good ground feel you need to dominate any court.
feature_bullets: Size - (8.5 B Us) | Color - (Black And Lemon Slush)
